articles.title: Messi and Mbappé Are Teammates Again-Whether They Like it or Not
articles.description: The two superstars have avoided each other since Argentina beat France in the World Cup final. But starting this week, they won’t have that option.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi has returned to practice at Paris Saint-Germain. He and teammate Kylian Mbappé haven’t trained together yet since they squared off in the World Cup final between Argentina and France last month.

articles.title: Watch Rihanna congratulate RRR team after she loses Golden Globe to Naatu Naatu, journalist says there was silence after Indian song won
articles.description: Besides Original Song for Naatu Naatu, RRR was also nominated in the Best Non-English Language Film category, which it lost to Argentina's Argentina 1985.
articles.content: Fans and the team of Indian blockbuster RRR are euphoric after the movie won a Golden Globe in the Best Song category for Naatu Naatu. The composer MM Keeravani received the trophy on stage as his colleagues — director SS Rajamouli, actors Ram Charan... [2656 chars]

articles.title: Golden Globes 2023: Naatu Naatu Wins But RRR Loses Best Non-English Language Film To Argentina 1985
articles.description: RRR loses Best Non-English Language Film at the Golden Globes 2023. The film will have to settle with one win, Best Original Song for Naatu Naatu.
articles.content: In a heartbreaking turn of events, SS Rajamouli’s RRR has to settle only for one win at the Golden Globes 2023. The film lost the Best Non-English Language Film award to Argentina, 1985. Others nominated in the category include the German war film Al... [1586 chars]

articles.title: Brutal drought in Argentina seen ending in coming months, says grains exchange
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Jan 10 (Reuters) - A drought that has parched Argentina's fields and slashed production of key cash crops is likely to break in coming months, though it could be March before rain and soil moisture levels fully return to normal, the Buenos Aires Grain Exchange (BdeC) said on Tuesday.Argentina is one of the world's top food producers, but dry conditions over much
